src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:837: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pkpoints location: class server.model.players.Client o.sendMessage("You have killed " + c.playerName + " and receive 5 pk points. You know have " + o.pkpoints + " p k points."); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Below o.lastKilled = Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom; add:

o.sendMessage("You have killed " + c.playerName + " and receive 4 pk points. You know have " + o.pkPpoints + " pk points.");

item.title: Help please would rep if i could
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

} if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom != o.lastKilled && !c.inPits) { o.pkPoints = (o.pkPoints + 4); o.lastKilled = Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom; } else { o.sendMessage("You do not recieve pk points because you have killed " +c.playerName+ " twice in a row."); } } }
this is in playerassistan.java
how would i edit this to say "you have killed (playername) and recive # pk points you now have # pk points
when you kill someone

would it be…?

} if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom != o.lastKilled && !c.inPits) { o.pkPoints = (o.pkPoints + 5); o.lastKilled = Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom; o.sendMessage("You revieve 5 pkp for killing " +c.playerName+ .") } else { o.sendMessage("You do not recieve pk points because you have killed " +c.playerName+ " twice in a row."); } } }
